SELECT PR.PLANT_NO , PL.PLANT_NM AS PRODUCT_NAME , MIN(PRODUCT_PRICE) AS PRODUCT_PRICE , PRODUCT_TYPE , COUNT(*) AS PRODUCT_NO FROM PRODUCT AS PR INNER JOIN PLANT AS PL WHERE PRODUCT_ACTIVE != 0 AND PRODUCT_TYPE = 0 AND PR.PLANT_NO = PL.PLANT_NO
AND PRODUCT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
GROUP BY PLANT_NO ORDER BY PRODUCT_CRAETETIME DESC
LIMIT
#{beginPage}
0
,
#{pageSize}
10
